name: Heli-Hat
description:
Heli-hat is a short 2D-platformer made from the Jame Game Christmas Edition game jam. Jump and glide your way through 10 levels using Santa's magical flying hat to help you along the way!

This game was made by a team of 2 (Dackss and Shoie) with sound effects from various online sources in about 4 days.  There are definitely some bugs but, we're proud of what we have. Merry Christmas! 

--Controls--

arrows key to move and jump (right, left, up)

hold Z to glide

--Sound Credits--

Wing sounds - Mike Koenig (Youtube)

Step sounds - EminYILDIRIM (Freesound.com)

Jump sides - cabled_mess (Freesound.com)

Wind sounds - Ankit Bhatia (Youtube)

Ice sounds - SoundMaster (Youtube)

Wing pickup - All Sounds (Youtube)
